channel.title: LOTS OF QUESTIONS - try solve?
channel.description: How To Leech Your Server So People cant steal how you make all files into a client i.e Run.bat how you change your home how you make talking npc's? how you change what npcs are wearnig how you move npcs... thanks if you know anyone of theese answers add garybuckley2008@hotmail.com

item.title: LOTS OF QUESTIONS - try solve?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Try looking in Client.java and search “spawn” and look for your home coords, if your online try doing ::mypos, or ::pos, not sure which for your base.

If you find those, use cntl + f in the document and then search 1 of the coords, and see if they match.

Read full topic

item.title: LOTS OF QUESTIONS - try solve?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

If your not releasing your client, and only posting for people to play, do NOT add an anti-leech, I would suggest making something hard to change, like making a few npc’s say something, or in your client, and making it in an unusual place, or like Taylor said, make a kind’ve easy noob fix, or what you can do, is make something correct, but make it to where it doesn’t work correct, make it compile with no errors.

Save it as a Run.

Change your autospawn, and move your shops to where you want it to be. ( Make it where you login and tele places (Playerhandler, or Client - Depending base)

npchandler or npctext ( Maybe )

Either make your own, or find a similiar npc that looks like that in different items.

Autospawn, NpcAutospawn. (Whichever)

Read full topic

item.title: LOTS OF QUESTIONS - try solve?
item.dc:creator: @taylor08 taylor08
item.description:
@taylor08 wrote:

  1. make some errors that are “KINDA” easy to fix but not too easy for noobs (BTW anti-leaching is for if your releasing DON’T DO IF YOUR NOT)

2.get jarmaker and jar your class files into a client.jar file and then sign your jar file(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9obXgxm_9qY)

3.search in rether client.java or/and player.java or/and playersave.java for the coords that you start on (::mypos > get the first value and search for it (IF YOU HAVE WINDOWS 7 or vista just search for the code in top right search bar))

4.npchandler.java

5.make your own model of the NPC with what you want on it using metaseq248(http://www.4shared.com/file/53033070/32a6d575/metaseq248.html (NOT MY FILE DONT KNOW IF ITS SAFE (VIRUS SCAN?)))

  1. your server > CFG > autospawn.cfg or something like that

HOPE THIS HELPED easy as pie

Read full topic
